df1 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_14.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
# Print the column names to verify the order
print("Columns in DataFrame:")
for col in df1.columns:
    print(col)

#display(df1)

import re

df1 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_14.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
matching_regex = r"Yhteensä Yhteensä (\d.*) Väestö 31.12."

for column in df1.columns:
    print(column)
    matchy = re.match(matching_regex, column)
    if matchy:
        print(f"Rename column '{column}' to column '{matchy.groups()[0]}'")
        df1 = df1.withColumnRenamed(column, matchy.groups()[0])
    elif column.lower() not in ["alue", "pääasiallinen toiminta"]:
        df1 = df1.drop(column)

display(df1)

import re
from pyspark.sql.functions import lit

# Rename "alue" to "kunta"
df1 = df1.withColumnRenamed("alue", "kunta")
df1 = df1.withColumnRenamed("Pääasiallinen toiminta", "paaasiallinen_toiminta")
df1 = df1.withColumnRenamed("2014", "yhteensa")

df1 = df1.withColumn("year", lit(2014))

display(df1)

df2 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_15.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
# Print the column names to verify the order
print("Columns in DataFrame:")
for col in df2.columns:
    print(col)
display(df2)

import re

df2 = spark.read.csv("abfss://vaesto@group2projectstorage.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/population_employment_15.csv", header=True, inferSchema=True, encoding="Latin1")
matchaava_regex = r"Yhteensä Yhteensä (\d.*) Väestö 31.12."

for column in df2.columns:
    matchi = re.match(matchaava_regex, column)
    if matchi:
        print(f"Rename column '{column}' to column '{matchi.groups()[0]}'")
        df2 = df2.withColumnRenamed(column, matchi.groups()[0])
    elif column.lower() not in ["alue", "pääasiallinen toiminta"]:
        df2 = df2.drop(column)

display(df2)

import pandas as pd

df_pd = df2.toPandas()
df_melted = pd.melt(df_pd, id_vars=['Alue', 'Pääasiallinen toiminta'], var_name='year', value_name='yhteensa')
# Convert Pandas DataFrame back to PySpark DataFrame
df_melted_spark = spark.createDataFrame(df_melted)
display(df_melted_spark)
